verses.name: Colossians 2:5
verses.text: For though I be absent in the flesh, yet am I with you in the spirit, joying and beholding your order, and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ.

verses.name: Colossians 2:6
verses.text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk ye in him:

verses.name: Colossians 2:7
verses.text: Rooted and built up in him, and stablished in the faith, as ye have been taught, abounding therein with thanksgiving.

verses.name: Colossians 2:8
verses.text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit, after the tradition of men, after the rudiments of the world, and not after Christ.

verses.name: Colossians 2:9
verses.text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily.
